title: Cloud Architect
description: We are hiring for a Cloud Architect role requiring a minimum of 5 years of experience in cloud architecture. Candidates should have expertise in AWS and Azure, with hands-on experience in containerization using Docker and Kubernetes. A solid understanding of networking and security in cloud environments is essential. Applicants should hold a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or a Master's in Computer Science. Preferred certifications include 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect' and 'Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert'.
